titleStmt.title: By the Quene the Quenes Maiestie strayghtly co[m]maundeth all maner of her admirals ... to permit & suffer al maner of subiectes of her good brothers the King of Spaine tradyng the seas ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted at London in Powles Church yarde, by Richard Jugge and John Cawood ...,

notesStmt.note: Second pt. of title from first six lines of text.
"Yeuen at her hyghnes castell of Wyndsor the fyrst day of September, the fyfth yere of her Maiesties reigne."
Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Queen's College (University of Oxford). Library.
